Load powerplay NHL play-by-play

load_nhl_pbp.Rd

helper that loads multiple seasons from the data repo either into memory or writes it into a db using some forwarded arguments in the dots

load_nhl_pbp(
  seasons = most_recent_nhl_season(),
  ...,
  dbConnection = NULL,
  tablename = NULL
)

Arguments

seasons

A vector of 4-digit years associated with given NHL seasons. (Min: 2002)
...

Additional arguments passed to an underlying function that writes the season data into a database (used by update_nhl_db()).
dbConnection

A DBIConnection object, as returned by DBI::dbConnect()
tablename

The name of the play by play data table within the database

Value

A dataframe

Examples

# \donttest{
load_nhl_pbp(2021)
#> # A tibble: 294,936 × 35
